animalTrials.label: Please provide keywords/terms associated with your dataset (comma separated). *

What is the purpose of the dataset? Provide a brief summary of potential research   questions that could be/are answered using the dataset and the types of data included (e.g., feed trials, environmental measurements, etc.).
Please describe each submitted file(s), including file name before description. Provide a brief overview of what the data is and what you want other project members to know about the file(s).
If you are not providing a data dictionary, please provide the metadata used in submitted files with their meaning and any naming conventions.
Please list any abbreviations within submitted file with their definitions
Are there publications that cite or use the data, if so provide links (DOI preferred)
Is the data governed by an IACUC or similar agreements. (Y/N)
Does your dataset include data licensed from a third-party. (Y/N) *
If any part of the dataset, contains data from a licensed a third-party source, please provide link to use agreement.
Does your dataset use any ancillary public data, if so please provide URL(s) to where the data came from.
If using any ancillary public datasets, please provide description(s) if URL(s) are not available.
If you have a GitHub related to the dataset, please provide link.
What are the number of files (all formats) associated with this ReadMe?
Please select all file extensions/formats that are part of your dataset (check all that apply).
Please provide brief overview of methodological research process related to dataset.
Please provide number of times fed per day
Please provide number of times milked per day
Please provide product form preparation for feeding

List of any relevant technologies (software, hardware, instruments, and versions) used in creating the data. Include standards and  calibration information, if appropriate (e.g. GreenFeed Emissions Monitoring system, etc.)
Please provide brief overview of sample collection, processing, analysis and/or submission procedures.

Provide descriptions of your methods used for quality assurance of data
